General.Name: Chumpower Machinery Corp
General.Description: Chumpower Machinery Corporation manufactures and sells PET blow molding machines in Taiwan and internationally. The company's products are used in various applications, such as mineral water, carbonated beverages, seasonings, tea, fruit juice, distilled water, alcoholic beverages, cooking oil, cleaning agents, cosmetics, fizzy drinks, cosmetic cleanser, detergents, tennis ball cans, medicine bottles, heat-resisting bottles, etc. Chumpower Machinery Corporation was founded in 1981 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.
